edu.stanford.nlp.ie.crf

Class NERGUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.stanford.nlp.ie.crf.NERGUI

  • public class NERGUI
extends java.lang.Object
    A GUI for Named Entity sequence classifiers. This version only supports the CRF.
    Author:
    Jenny Finkel, Christopher Manning
